title: Morro do Estado
text:
Morro do Estado (<a href="Portuguese%20language">Portuguese</a> for "State Hill") is a <a href="hill">hill</a> and one of the <a href="Neighborhoods%20of%20Niter%C3%B3i">48 administrative districts</a> in the city of <a href="Niter%C3%B3i">Niterói</a>, <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro%20%28state%29">Rio de Janeiro</a>, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. 
The neighborhood lies in the southern zone of the city, neighboring <a href="Ing%C3%A1">Ingá</a> and <a href="Icara%C3%AD">Icaraí</a>. 
The hill has a "<a href="favela">favela</a>" (Brazilian slum) district, that is very poor and often violent.
